08S.F.summary: PT Bank Sinarmas Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. The company operates through Marketing and Credit, Treasury, and Trade Finance segments. It is involved in treasury activities; and the issuance of debt and trade financing activities. The company also invests in securities and money markets. It has 1 main branch, 68 branches, 1 functional sub-branch, 25 functional UMK offices, 3 functional UMK sharia offices, 133 sub-branches, 28 sharia branches, 143 cash offices, 12 sharia cash offices, and 3 cash cars in Indonesia. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Shinta Indonesia and changed its name to PT Bank Sinarmas Tbk in January 2007. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Sinarmas Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sinar Mas Multiartha Tbk.

2PS.F.short_name: PT BK PANIN DU. SY. RP100
2PS.F.long_name: PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk
2PS.F.summary: PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk operates as a sharia commercial bank for retail, commercial, and corporate customers in Indonesia. It accepts demand, time, current, savings, and other forms of deposits, as well as certificates of deposit. The company also offers PaS iB profit sharing, working capital, house ownership, investment, multi-service, car ownership, sharia revolving, and other financing products. In addition, it purchases securities based on sharia principles, such as retail Sukuk, government sharia bonds, and corporate Sukuk; and issues reference letters. Further, it provides debit cards, online and mobile banking, billing payment, insurance, safe deposit box, real time gross settlement, bank guarantee, PDSB standing order, and clearing services, as well as cash management systems. It operates through a network of 17 branch offices, and 22 ATMs. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Panin Syariah Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk in July 2016. PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk is a subsidiary of P.T. Bank Pan Indonesia Tbk.

4JY1.SG.summary: PT Bank BTPN Tbk provides various banking products and services primarily in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Retail; Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises; Funding and Treasury; Corporate; and Sharia. It offers savings accounts, and time deposits; bancassurance and investment products, such as mutual fund and government bonds; and working capital and investment loans, syndication solutions, loans for retailers, project and export credit agencies financing, loans, active employee loans, employee credit facilities, collateral-free loans, term and term installment loans, working capital loans, investment loans, and overdraft facility. The company also provides transaction banking services comprising treasury solutions; and remittance, tax payment, trade, and cash management services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 84 branches and 226 branches. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank BTPN Tbk is a subsidiary of Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation.

5BB.SG.summary: PT Bank KB Bukopin Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers individual and business savings accounts, current accounts, and deposits; home loans, car loans, commercial loans, pension credit, and multipurpose loans; and credit and debit cards. It also provides wealth management, syndication, custody, and e- banking services. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated through a network of 43 branches, 173 sub-branches, 9 functional offices, 169 cash offices, and 25 payment points. It also operates 850 ATMs. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Bukopin Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank KB Bukopin Tbk in February 2021. PT Bank KB Bukopin Tbk was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

6IN.F.summary: PT Bank Ina Perdana Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It operates through Marketing and Loans, Treasury, and Trade Finance segments. The company offers current, savings, and time deposits, as well as certificates of deposit and other bank deposits. It also provides commercial and consumer credit products; and bill payment, payroll, and automatic teller machine services. The company operates through a network of 10 branch offices, 10 sub-branch offices, and 7 cash offices. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

AGRO.JK.long_name: PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia Agroniaga Tbk
AGRO.JK.summary: PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia Agroniaga Tbk provides various retail, consumer, and medium commercial banking products and services in Indonesia. It accepts current accounts, and time deposits. The company's loan products include investment, working capital, collateral cash, construction, account statement, productive employee, retirement saving, pension, agro griya and car, multipurpose loans, as well as KKPE, KPEN RP, and commercial KKPA program loans. It also offers saving products; provides export/import transaction, guarantee banking, LLG and RTGS transfer, clearing, credit cards, and foreign exchange transaction services, as well as domestic credit letters and save deposit boxes. In addition, the company provides mobile and Internet banking, and treasury banking services; cash management systems; and ATM cards. As of December 31, 2020, it operated through 18 branch offices and 20 sub branch offices; and 4 cash offices. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Agroniaga Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia Agroniaga Tbk in 2012. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia Agroniaga Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk.

AGRS.JK.summary: PT Bank IBK Indonesia Tbk provides banking products and services in Indonesia. The company accepts savings and giro/checking accounts, and deposits. It also offers working capital, investment credit, and consumption/consumptive credit loans, as well as non-cash loans; trade finance products, such as export and import documentary credit, L/C amendment and/settlement, negotiation, trust receipt, standby and transfer letters of credit, and letters of guarantee/shipping guarantee, as well as ATM, import and export, guarantee, and remittance services. As of December 31, 2019, it had 11 branches, 11 sub-branches, and 7 cash offices located in Jakarta, Bekasi, Bandung, Surabaya, Lampung, Solo, Medan, Palembang, Tangerang, Semarang, Pontianak, and Pekanbaru. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank IBK Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Industrial Bank of Korea.

AMAR.JK.summary: PT Bank Amar Indonesia engages in the banking activities in Indonesia. The company offers saving, current, and time deposit accounts; and working capital, special financing, and investment loans, as well as financing for financial institutions. It operates 3 branches in Jakarta and Surabaya; 1 sub-branch in Surabaya; and 1 cash office and 1 functional office in Jakarta. The company was formerly known as PT. Anglomas International Bank and changed its name to PT Bank Amar Indonesia in 2014. PT Bank Amar Indonesia was founded in 1991 and is based in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Bank Amar Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Tolaram Group Inc.

ARTO.JK.summary: PT Bank Jago Tbk provides various banking products and services for small and medium enterprises, retail, and mass market segments in Indonesia. It offers current accounts, savings products, time deposits, and certificates of deposit. The company also provides various loan products comprising working capital loans, investment loans, consumer loans, mortgages for home and shop house, car/motorcycle loans, multipurpose loans, kredit artos sejahtera, kredit artos manfaat, kredit artos berdikari, and bank guarantee. In addition, it offers foreign currency exchange, transaction shuttle, bill payments, money transfer/RTGS/SKN, clearing, employee payroll facility, and safe deposit boxes, as well as ATM, alto, and prima networking services. It operates through a head office, 2 branch offices, 3 sub-branch offices, and 1 cash office. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Artos Indonesia Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank Jago Tbk in June 2020. PT Bank Jago Tbk was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

BABB.F.summary: PT Bank Permata Tbk provides banking products and services to retail, SME, and wholesale customers in Indonesia. The company offers current accounts and time deposits; savings products; mortgages; personal and working capital loans, and loans for SME, as well as trade and supply chain financing; and credit and debit cards. It also provides mutual funds, bonds, and bancassurance products; wealth and cash management, treasury, and capital market services; and transaction and Syariah banking, as well as e-banking services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 70 branches, 214 sub-branches, 281 Sharia office channeling, 17 cash offices, and 4 mobile cash offices, as well as 925 ATMs. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Bali Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank Permata Tbk in October 2002. PT Bank Permata Tbk was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Permata Tbk is a subsidiary of Bangkok Bank Public Company Limited.

BABP.JK.summary: PT Bank MNC Internasional Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It operates through Business, Consumer, Treasury, and Others segments. The company accepts demand, savings, and time deposits, as well as certificate of deposits. Its loan products include working capital, investment, property, and unsecured loans. The company also offers credit cards; merchant services; treasury services, including foreign exchange and retail bonds; trade and finance services, such as export, import, and local transactions; and bancassurance, and online and mobile banking services, as well as automated teller machine (ATM) services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 16 main branch offices, 21 supporting branch offices, 10 cash offices, and 77 ATMs. The company was formerly known as PT Bank ICB Bumiputera Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank MNC Internasional Tbk in April 2014. PT Bank MNC Internasional Tbk was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

BACA.JK.summary: PT Bank Capital Indonesia Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. The company accepts current accounts, savings, and time deposits; and offers various loans. It operates through 3 branches, 24 sub-branches, and 50 cash service offices. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Credit Lyonnais Indonesia and changed its name to PT Bank Capital Indonesia Tbk in September 2004. PT Bank Capital Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

BANK.JK.summary: PT Bank Net Indonesia Syariah provides sharia banking products and services for corporate and commercial customers in Indonesia. Its products and services include current, savings, and restricted profit-sharing investment accounts, as well as time deposits; and term, revolving, overdraft, and syndicated financing products. The company also provides trade finance products and services, such as letter of credit, import and export financing, inward and outward documentary collection, bank guarantee, and LC/SKBDN usance payable at sight. Its financing products and services also cover project, contract, asset acquisition and investment, refinancing, and working capital financing. PT Bank Net Indonesia Syariah was formerly known as PT Bank Maybank Syariah Indonesia and changed its name to PT Bank Net Indonesia Syariah in December 2019. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Bank Net Indonesia Syariah is a subsidiary of PT NTI Global Indonesia.

BBCA.JK.summary: PT Bank Central Asia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services to individual, corporate, and small and medium enterprise customers in Indonesia and internationally. It offers deposits accounts, loans, transaction banking services, electronic banking services, cash management services, credit cards, bancassurance products, mutual fund and treasury investment products, credit facilities, standby LC/bank guarantees, export import facilities, local LC, and foreign exchange facilities. The company also provides investment financing, working capital financing, auto and multipurpose financing, operating lease, other financing activities, money lending and remittance, securities brokerage dealing and securities issuance underwriting, general or loss insurance, life insurance, Sharia banking, and venture capital services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 1,248 offices comprising 139 main branches, 874 sub-branches, and 235 cash offices; and 17,623 automated teller machines. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dwimuria Investama Andalan.

BBHI.JK.summary: PT Bank Harda Internasional Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers savings, Giro, deposits saving, and current accounts; time deposits; and working capital, investment, housing and car, multi-function, consumer, and simulation installment loans, as well as bank guarantees. The company also provides safety deposit boxes; and treasury and ATM services. It operates 8 branch, 7 sub-branch, and 2 cash offices. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Arta Griya and changed its name to PT Bank Harda Internasional Tbk in January 1993. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Harda Internasional Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Mega Corpora.

BBKP.JK.summary: PT Bank KB Bukopin Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers individual and business savings accounts, current accounts, and deposits; home loans, car loans, commercial loans, pension credit, and multipurpose loans; and credit and debit cards. It also provides wealth management, syndication, custody, and e- banking services. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated through a network of 43 branches, 173 sub-branches, 9 functional offices, 169 cash offices, and 25 payment points. It also operates 850 ATMs. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Bukopin Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank KB Bukopin Tbk in February 2021. PT Bank KB Bukopin Tbk was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BBMD.JK.summary: PT Bank Mestika Dharma, Tbk provides banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers savings accounts, current accounts, and time deposits; and multi-purpose, house, car, and land loans, as well as trade finance, working capital loans, and investment credit services. The company also provides mobile, Internet, and SMS banking; ATM card; safe deposit box, export and import; money changer; telegraphic transfer; money transfer; import tax payment; tax payment facility; e-channel facility; and virtual account services, as well as bancassurance products and services. It operates through 12 branches, as well as various sub-branches, cash offices, and automatic teller machines. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Medan, Indonesia. PT Bank Mestika Dharma, Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Mestika Benua Mas.

BBNI.JK.summary: PT Bank Negara Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services in Indonesia, the United States, Europe, and Asia. The company offers current account, savings, and time deposit products. It also provides credit facilities for the purchase of residential houses, apartments, flats, shop/shop houses, rest houses, and lots/land ripe in real estate construction, as well as for construction/renovation, refinancing, and take over; credit facilities without collateral; credit facilities for the purchase of motor vehicle wheels; loans to the company's deposit, savings, and current account holders; and revolving loans, working capital loans, and medium or long term loans to businesses. In addition, the company offers debit and credit cards; SMS, Internet, and phone banking services, as well as automated teller machine services; domestic and international remittances, safe deposit boxes, bank references, travelers cheques, foreign bank notes, and collection payment services; retirement savings products; banc assurance services; cash management and loan syndication services; facilities, security, Escrow, and paying agency services; and fund, custody, trustee, and bank guarantee services. Further, it provides facilities for ease of planning investment in money market instruments and capital markets, mutual funds, and brokerage services for bond transactions; personal life, accident, and health insurance; forfeiting, bill collection financing, open account financing, and trade transaction services; and foreign exchange services, money market accounts, deposit on call, and derivative products. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 201 domestic branches, 1,093 sub-branches, and 925 other outlets, as well as 5 overseas branches located in Singapore, Hong Kong, Tokyo, London, and Seoul; and 1 representative office in New York. PT Bank Negara Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BBRI.JK.summary: PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia, Singapore, Timor Leste, Hong Kong, and the United States. The company offers current and savings accounts; time deposits; vehicle, home, micro business, working capital, investment, food, warehouse receipt, partnership, franchise, and cash collateral loans, as well as loans for borrowers/debtors; and supply chain financing solutions. It also provides banking services, such as bill payment, deposit, online transaction, money transfer, and remittance services; investment products, such as pension and mutual funds, and government retail bonds and retail sukuk products; import and export services; letter of credits; and BRI RTE online system and money changer services. In addition, the company offers Internet banking and merchant services; credit cards; business guarantee and clearing business services; financial and institutional business banking services; and treasury, custodian, trustee, and cash management services. PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1895 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BBSI.JK.summary: PT Bank Bisnis Internasional Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers savings products, deposits, and credit facilities. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Bandung, Indonesia.

BBTN.JK.summary: PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. The company offers savings and current accounts; demand and time deposits; certificates of deposit; and debit cards. It also provides subsidized and other mortgages; consumer and construction loans; micro and small medium enterprise credits; commercial and institutional funding services; and credit cards. In addition, the company issues debts instruments; buys and sells bills of exchange, promissory notes, commercial papers, treasury bills, government insurance notes, Bank Indonesia certificates, bonds, and other securities instruments; places, borrows, or lends funds from other banks; receives payment from securities bills; acts as a pension fund provider and manager; and conducts Sharia-principle business activities. Further, it offers safekeeping, factoring, trustee, investment banking, treasury, asset management, wealth management, electronic data capture, cash management, branchless banking, bank guarantees, safe deposit box, transfer or remittance, payroll, and other banking services; and electronic banking services, such as automatic teller machine and KiosK, cash deposit machine, internet, virtual account, SMS, and mobile banking services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 103 branches, including 25 Sharia branches; 373 sub-branches comprising 59 Sharia sub-branches; 254 cash offices, including 7 Sharia cash offices; and 3,014 system online payment point/online post offices. The company was formerly known as Bank Tabungan Pos and changed its name to PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk in 1963. PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1897 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BBYB.JK.summary: PT Bank Neo Commerce Tbk provides various commercial banking products and services in Indonesia. The company offers current accounts, savings accounts, time deposits, and deposit on call products; pension, package, multipurpose, car, mortgage, personal, working capital, and investment loans; and other banking products and services, including the clearing system, real time gross settlement, collection, bank guarantee, domestic document loan letter, letters bank reference, and other services. It operates through 12 branch offices, 9 sub-branch office, and 11 cash offices. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Yudha Bhakti Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank Neo Commerce Tbk in September 2020. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BDMN.JK.summary: PT Bank Danamon Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking and financial products and services for consumers, small medium enterprises, and commercial and corporate customers in Indonesia. It operates through Retail and Wholesale segments. The company offers savings, checking, and current accounts; time and Sharia deposits; and credit and debit cards. It also provides unsecured personal loans, secured property mortgages, Sharia housing loans, and automotive and business financing services; Sharia leasing; employee cooperative, working capital, investment, trade, mortgage, and financial supply chain financing; and cash management services comprising collection, payment, and liquidity management services. In addition, the company offers foreign exchange, interest rate swap and cross currency swap, marketable securities, money market, and repo/reverse repo products and services; Shariah business and personal; e-banking; personal, investment related, health, and general insurance products and services; investment products, such as mutual funds, investment plans, bonds, and foreign exchanges; and other solutions. As December 31, 2020, the company had 44 conventional main branches; 384 conventional sub-branches, cash branches, and functional branches; and 11 Sharia branches and sub-branches. It also operates a network of approximately 1,487 automated teller machines and 70 cash deposit machines. The company was formerly known as Bank Kopra Indonesia and changed its name to PT Bank Danamon Indonesia Tbk in 1976. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Danamon Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of MUFG Bank, Ltd.

BEKS.JK.long_name: PT. Bank Pembangunan Daerah Banten, Tbk
BEKS.JK.summary: PT. Bank Pembangunan Daerah Banten, Tbk provides various banking services in Indonesia. It offers demand, savings, and time deposits, as well as current accounts; and investment, working capital, and consumer loans. The company also provides consumer, employee, and MSME credit services, as well as e-banking services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated approximately 150 automated teller machines. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Pundi Indonesia, Tbk and changed its name to PT. Bank Pembangunan Daerah Banten, Tbk in August 2016. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Serang, Indonesia. PT. Bank Pembangunan Daerah Banten, Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Banten Global Development.

BGTG.JK.summary: P.T. Bank Ganesha Tbk provides various general banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Indonesia. The company operates through Banking, Consumer, Treasury, and Others segments. It accepts savings, current, and time deposits. The company also provides fixed income, car, housing, working capital, and investment loans, as well as letters of credit and bank guarantees. In addition, it offers safe deposit boxes, credit cards, and e-statements; automated teller machine, remittance, phone and electricity bill payment, tax payment, export/import, foreign exchange, and other banking services; and bancassurance products. The company serves customers through a network of 1 head office, 11 branch/sub-branch offices, and 2 cash offices. P.T. Bank Ganesha Tbk was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BINA.JK.summary: PT Bank Ina Perdana Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It operates through Marketing and Loans, Treasury, and Trade Finance segments. The company offers current, savings, and time deposits, as well as certificates of deposit and other bank deposits. It also provides commercial and consumer credit products; and bill payment, payroll, and automatic teller machine services. The company operates through a network of 10 branch offices, 10 sub-branch offices, and 7 cash offices. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BJBR.JK.long_name: PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat dan Banten Tbk
BJBR.JK.summary: PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat dan Banten Tbk provides banking products and services to individual and corporate customers in Indonesia. It offers current, savings, time, and interbank call money deposits, as well as certificates of deposit and deposit on calls; consumer, working capital, small business, and short term loans; supply chain finance, cash collateral credit, and bank guarantee facilities; and card and debit cards. The company also provides treasury, insurance, mutual fund, foreign exchange, cash management, trade finance, e-banking, and safe deposit box services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 65 branch offices, 315 sub-branches, 346 cash offices, and 213 payment points. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat and changed its name to PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat dan Banten Tbk in November 2007. PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat dan Banten Tbk was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Bandung, Indonesia.

BJTM.JK.long_name: PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Timur Tbk
BJTM.JK.summary: PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Timur Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. The company offers savings and current accounts, and fixed and time deposits; personal and productivity loans; and property construction loans, bank guarantees, checking accounts, investment loans, credit modal Kerja, syndicated loans, financing receivables loans, cash collateral credit, local government loans, and Bureau of Public Service Area loans. It also provides common foreign exchange, hedging forward contract, hedging swap, bank note, deposit on call, and documentation services. In addition, the company offers Sharia savings, deposit, and financing products; merchant relationship program; automated teller machines (ATM), Internet and mobile banking services; SMS banking services; virtual accounts; electronic government staff, debit cards, and prepaid cards; and foreign exchange transaction and remittance services. Further, it provides letters of credit; import tax and letter of credit undocumented affair services; bank guarantee forex services; safe deposit boxes; and money transfer and other banking services. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 41 branches, 7 Sharia branches, 162 conventional sub branches, 10 Sharia sub-branches, 209 cash offices, 247 payment points, 9 Sharia payment points, 195 Sharia service offices, 777 ATMs, 24 Sharia ATMs, 27 automated deposit machines, 92 cash conventional ATM vehicles, and 6 cash Sharia ATM vehicles. PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Timur Tbk was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.

BKE1.F.summary: PT Bank Negara Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services in Indonesia, the United States, Europe, and Asia. The company offers current account, savings, and time deposit products. It also provides credit facilities for the purchase of residential houses, apartments, flats, shop/shop houses, rest houses, and lots/land ripe in real estate construction, as well as for construction/renovation, refinancing, and take over; credit facilities without collateral; credit facilities for the purchase of motor vehicle wheels; loans to the company's deposit, savings, and current account holders; and revolving loans, working capital loans, and medium or long term loans to businesses. In addition, the company offers debit and credit cards; SMS, Internet, and phone banking services, as well as automated teller machine services; domestic and international remittances, safe deposit boxes, bank references, travelers cheques, foreign bank notes, and collection payment services; retirement savings products; banc assurance services; cash management and loan syndication services; facilities, security, Escrow, and paying agency services; and fund, custody, trustee, and bank guarantee services. Further, it provides facilities for ease of planning investment in money market instruments and capital markets, mutual funds, and brokerage services for bond transactions; personal life, accident, and health insurance; forfeiting, bill collection financing, open account financing, and trade transaction services; and foreign exchange services, money market accounts, deposit on call, and derivative products. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 201 domestic branches, 1,093 sub-branches, and 925 other outlets, as well as 5 overseas branches located in Singapore, Hong Kong, Tokyo, London, and Seoul; and 1 representative office in New York. PT Bank Negara Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BKRKF.summary: PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia, Singapore, Timor Leste, Hong Kong, and the United States. The company offers current and savings accounts; time deposits; vehicle, home, micro business, working capital, investment, food, warehouse receipt, partnership, franchise, and cash collateral loans, as well as loans for borrowers/debtors; and supply chain financing solutions. It also provides banking services, such as bill payment, deposit, online transaction, money transfer, and remittance services; investment products, such as pension and mutual funds, and government retail bonds and retail sukuk products; import and export services; letter of credits; and BRI RTE online system and money changer services. In addition, the company offers Internet banking and merchant services; credit cards; business guarantee and clearing business services; financial and institutional business banking services; and treasury, custodian, trustee, and cash management services. PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1895 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BKRKY.summary: PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia, Singapore, Timor Leste, Hong Kong, and the United States. The company offers current and savings accounts; time deposits; vehicle, home, micro business, working capital, investment, food, warehouse receipt, partnership, franchise, and cash collateral loans, as well as loans for borrowers/debtors; and supply chain financing solutions. It also provides banking services, such as bill payment, deposit, online transaction, money transfer, and remittance services; investment products, such as pension and mutual funds, and government retail bonds and retail sukuk products; import and export services; letter of credits; and BRI RTE online system and money changer services. In addition, the company offers Internet banking and merchant services; credit cards; business guarantee and clearing business services; financial and institutional business banking services; and treasury, custodian, trustee, and cash management services. PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1895 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BKSW.JK.summary: PT Bank QNB Indonesia Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers savings, checking, current, and multi-currency accounts; and time deposits. The company also provides mutual funds, such as equity, money market, capital protected, fixed income, and balance funds; bancassurance services; cash management and trade finance services; and mobile and online banking, and ATM services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated a network of 11 branch offices, 7 sub-branch offices, and 42 ATMs. PT Bank QNB Indonesia Tbk operates in Jakarta, Sumatera, Jawa, and East region. The company was formerly known as PT Bank QNB Kesawan Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank QNB Indonesia Tbk in July 2014. PT Bank QNB Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank QNB Indonesia Tbk operates as a subsidiary of Qatar National Bank (Q.P.S.C.).

BMAS.JK.summary: PT Bank Maspion Indonesia Tbk provides various banking products and services. It offers savings and current accounts; time deposits; working capital, investment, consumer, general personal, and car loans; and trade finance services, such as letters of credit and bank guarantee services. The company also provides automatic teller machines (ATM), Internet and mobile banking, payroll, safe deposit box, and transfer services. As of December 31, 2019, it had 10 branches, 26 sub-branches, 7 cash offices, 2 small and medium enterprise functional offices, 7 mobile cash, 64 ATMs, 6 cash deposit machines, and 3 cash recycling machines located at Surabaya, Jakarta, Semarang, Denpasar, Medan, Bandung, Makassar, Malang, Solo, Purwokerto, and Palembang. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Bank Maspion Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Alim Investindo.

BMRI.JK.summary: PT Bank Mandiri (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services to individuals and businesses in Indonesia, Singapore, Hong Kong, Timor Leste, Shanghai, Malaysia, the United Kingdom, and the Cayman Islands. It offers savings and current accounts, time deposits, demand deposits, and foreign currency savings and current accounts; motorcycle loans and housing loans, as well as loans for various purposes, such as education, home renovation, marriage, health, and other needs for individuals; and working capital loans, investment loans, people's business loans, syndicated loans, and micro business loans for businesses. The company also provides investment products comprising mutual funds and retail state bonds; life, health, and general insurance products; credit, debit, and corporate cards; e-banking services; cash management services; trade finance services, such as financial supply chain management, value chain, import and export, and bank guarantee and standby letters of credit services; custodial services; treasury services, including cash transaction/liquidity and hedging products; trust services comprising trustee, paying agent, security agent, escrow agent, monitoring agent, and receiving bank services; and bankassurance, money transfer, and remittance services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 2,714 office networks and 13,217 ATM networks. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BNBA.JK.summary: P.T. Bank Bumi Arta Tbk provides banking products and services in Indonesia. The company provides call and term deposits; and business financing solutions, including account, fixed, demand, house and car ownership, pension, term, multipurpose, export and import financing, and investment loans. In addition, it offers bank guarantee and payment services; ATM and mobile banking services; and other services, such as bank notes, corporate payroll, and bank drafts. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated a network of 10 branches, 22 sub-branches, 18 cash offices, and 9 payment points in Indonesia. P.T. Bank Bumi Arta Tbk was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BNGA.JK.summary: PT Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk provides various banking products and services to small to medium enterprises, individuals, and corporate customers in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Corporate, Business, Retail, Treasury, and Sharia segments. It offers consumer banking products and services, including mortgage, auto, and personal loans, as well as partnership vehicle ownership financing; credit and debit cards; wealth management products; general and life bancassurance products; savings products; digital banking services; saving, current, time, and term deposit products; digital banking products and services; treasury products comprising foreign exchange, strike currency, market linked deposits, swap depos and bonds, and mutual fund products. The company also provides business banking products and services comprising working capital, investment, and financing loans; cash management, trade finance, and other bank services; treasury services that include foreign exchange, money market, derivatives, placements investing, securities transactions, and hedging products; and remittance and value chain services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated a network of 451 branches; 4,316 ATMs; 133 cash deposit machines; and 801 cash recycle machines. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Niaga Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk in May 2008. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk is a subsidiary of CIMB Group Sdn Bhd.

BNII.JK.summary: PT Bank Maybank Indonesia Tbk provides general banking services in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Global Banking, Business Banking, and Retail segments. It offers savings accounts, current accounts, and demand and time deposits; mortgages; wealth management; and digital banking services, as well as credit cards. The company also provides personal, multifunctional, car, motorcycle, syndicated, investment, and working capital loans; supply chain, community, commercial property and vehicle, franchise, heavy equipment, medical equipment, and structured financing; investment products, such as government bonds, mutual funds, and capital protected funds; and bancassurance and retail general insurance services. In addition, it offers trade finance services, including letters of credit, trust receipts financing, pre and post shipment financing, and guarantees; custodian services; cash management services comprising payments, collection, and liquidity management services; and remittance services, as well as Shariah banking services. Further, the company offers foreign exchange and fixed income services, and currency and interest rates hedging services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 79 branches, 277 sub branches, 1 micro sub-branch, 14 Sharia branches, 1 overseas branch, and 1,571 ATM's. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Internasional Indonesia Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank Maybank Indonesia Tbk. PT Bank Maybank Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BNLI.JK.summary: PT Bank Permata Tbk provides banking products and services to retail, SME, and wholesale customers in Indonesia. The company offers current accounts and time deposits; savings products; mortgages; personal and working capital loans, and loans for SME, as well as trade and supply chain financing; and credit and debit cards. It also provides mutual funds, bonds, and bancassurance products; wealth and cash management, treasury, and capital market services; and transaction and Syariah banking, as well as e-banking services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 70 branches, 214 sub-branches, 281 Sharia office channeling, 17 cash offices, and 4 mobile cash offices, as well as 925 ATMs. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Bali Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank Permata Tbk in October 2002. PT Bank Permata Tbk was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Permata Tbk is a subsidiary of Bangkok Bank Public Company Limited.

BOZA.F.summary: PT Bank Maybank Indonesia Tbk provides general banking services in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Global Banking, Business Banking, and Retail segments. It offers savings accounts, current accounts, and demand and time deposits; mortgages; wealth management; and digital banking services, as well as credit cards. The company also provides personal, multifunctional, car, motorcycle, syndicated, investment, and working capital loans; supply chain, community, commercial property and vehicle, franchise, heavy equipment, medical equipment, and structured financing; investment products, such as government bonds, mutual funds, and capital protected funds; and bancassurance and retail general insurance services. In addition, it offers trade finance services, including letters of credit, trust receipts financing, pre and post shipment financing, and guarantees; custodian services; cash management services comprising payments, collection, and liquidity management services; and remittance services, as well as Shariah banking services. Further, the company offers foreign exchange and fixed income services, and currency and interest rates hedging services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 79 branches, 277 sub branches, 1 micro sub-branch, 14 Sharia branches, 1 overseas branch, and 1,571 ATM's. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Internasional Indonesia Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank Maybank Indonesia Tbk. PT Bank Maybank Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BRIS.JK.summary: PT Bank Syariah Indonesia Tbk provides various commercial banking products and services in Indonesia. The company operated through commercial, retail linkage, consumer, micro, and others segments. It offers banking products and services that include savings, demand deposits, and time deposits; micro financing; working capital and investment financing; and internet banking services. The company also provides movable or immovable property lease financing; debit and financing cards; buying, selling, and guaranteeing third party securities; money transfer; custody services; letter of credit; bank guarantee; trustee; foreign exchange; and issues, offers, and trades in short and long term securities. As of December 31, 2020, it operated through a network of 71 branch offices, 318 sub-branch offices, 10 cash offices, and 2,179 sharia service offices. PT Bank Syariah Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Bank Syariah Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk.

BSIM.JK.summary: PT Bank Sinarmas Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. The company operates through Marketing and Credit, Treasury, and Trade Finance segments. It is involved in treasury activities; and the issuance of debt and trade financing activities. The company also invests in securities and money markets. It has 1 main branch, 68 branches, 1 functional sub-branch, 25 functional UMK offices, 3 functional UMK sharia offices, 133 sub-branches, 28 sharia branches, 143 cash offices, 12 sharia cash offices, and 3 cash cars in Indonesia. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Shinta Indonesia and changed its name to PT Bank Sinarmas Tbk in January 2007. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Sinarmas Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sinar Mas Multiartha Tbk.

BTPN.JK.summary: PT Bank BTPN Tbk provides various banking products and services primarily in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Retail; Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises; Funding and Treasury; Corporate; and Sharia. It offers savings accounts, and time deposits; bancassurance and investment products, such as mutual fund and government bonds; and working capital and investment loans, syndication solutions, loans for retailers, project and export credit agencies financing, loans, active employee loans, employee credit facilities, collateral-free loans, term and term installment loans, working capital loans, investment loans, and overdraft facility. The company also provides transaction banking services comprising treasury solutions; and remittance, tax payment, trade, and cash management services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 84 branches and 226 branches. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank BTPN Tbk is a subsidiary of Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation.

BTPS.JK.summary: PT Bank BTPN Syariah Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers savings and current accounts; time deposits; and various financing services. The company also provides bills payment, credit purchase, fund transfer, cash deposit and withdrawal, ATM, and mobile banking services. It operates through a network of 23 branch offices, 2 supporting branch offices, 41 operational functional offices, 3 non-operational functional offices, 26 sharia banking services, and 9 ATMs. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Tabungan Pensiunan Nasional Syariah Tbk. PT Bank BTPN Syariah Tbk was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Bank BTPN Syariah Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bank BTPN Tbk.

BVIC.JK.summary: PT Bank Victoria International Tbk provides banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers various savings accounts; demand, time, and forex deposits; current accounts; bank guarantees; and loan products, such as home and car ownership loan, multi-purpose credit, implant banking credit, and domestic letters of credit, as well as commercial lending, small medium enterprise lending, and multi finance lending products. The company also provides investment products; foreign exchange bank services, including remittance, trade finance, and treasury and other interbank services; and clearing/payment, transfer, real time gross settlement (RTGS), bill payment, ATM, and internet and mobile banking services, as well as Sharia banking services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated a network of 92 offices consisting of 1 head office, 14 branch offices, 63 sub branch offices branches, and 8 cash offices. PT Bank Victoria International Tbk was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

BYRA.F.summary: PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia, Singapore, Timor Leste, Hong Kong, and the United States. The company offers current and savings accounts; time deposits; vehicle, home, micro business, working capital, investment, food, warehouse receipt, partnership, franchise, and cash collateral loans, as well as loans for borrowers/debtors; and supply chain financing solutions. It also provides banking services, such as bill payment, deposit, online transaction, money transfer, and remittance services; investment products, such as pension and mutual funds, and government retail bonds and retail sukuk products; import and export services; letter of credits; and BRI RTE online system and money changer services. In addition, the company offers Internet banking and merchant services; credit cards; business guarantee and clearing business services; financial and institutional business banking services; and treasury, custodian, trustee, and cash management services. PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1895 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BZG.F.summary: PT Bank Central Asia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services to individual, corporate, and small and medium enterprise customers in Indonesia and internationally. It offers deposits accounts, loans, transaction banking services, electronic banking services, cash management services, credit cards, bancassurance products, mutual fund and treasury investment products, credit facilities, standby LC/bank guarantees, export import facilities, local LC, and foreign exchange facilities. The company also provides investment financing, working capital financing, auto and multipurpose financing, operating lease, other financing activities, money lending and remittance, securities brokerage dealing and securities issuance underwriting, general or loss insurance, life insurance, Sharia banking, and venture capital services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 1,248 offices comprising 139 main branches, 874 sub-branches, and 235 cash offices; and 17,623 automated teller machines. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dwimuria Investama Andalan.

BZG2.F.summary: PT Bank Central Asia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services to individual, corporate, and small and medium enterprise customers in Indonesia and internationally. It offers deposits accounts, loans, transaction banking services, electronic banking services, cash management services, credit cards, bancassurance products, mutual fund and treasury investment products, credit facilities, standby LC/bank guarantees, export import facilities, local LC, and foreign exchange facilities. The company also provides investment financing, working capital financing, auto and multipurpose financing, operating lease, other financing activities, money lending and remittance, securities brokerage dealing and securities issuance underwriting, general or loss insurance, life insurance, Sharia banking, and venture capital services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 1,248 offices comprising 139 main branches, 874 sub-branches, and 235 cash offices; and 17,623 automated teller machines. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dwimuria Investama Andalan.

DNAR.JK.summary: PT Bank Oke Indonesia Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers current and saving account, demand, and time deposits, as well as certificates of deposit; and offers working capital, investment, and consumer loans, such as mortgages and vehicle loans. The company also provides transfer of funds through RTGS and SKN, ATMs, telephone Payment, foreign exchange, safe deposit box leasing, and bank guarantee services, as well as internet/mobile banking services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 19 branches. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Oke Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Apro Financial Co., Ltd.

HX9.F.summary: PT Bank Danamon Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking and financial products and services for consumers, small medium enterprises, and commercial and corporate customers in Indonesia. It operates through Retail and Wholesale segments. The company offers savings, checking, and current accounts; time and Sharia deposits; and credit and debit cards. It also provides unsecured personal loans, secured property mortgages, Sharia housing loans, and automotive and business financing services; Sharia leasing; employee cooperative, working capital, investment, trade, mortgage, and financial supply chain financing; and cash management services comprising collection, payment, and liquidity management services. In addition, the company offers foreign exchange, interest rate swap and cross currency swap, marketable securities, money market, and repo/reverse repo products and services; Shariah business and personal; e-banking; personal, investment related, health, and general insurance products and services; investment products, such as mutual funds, investment plans, bonds, and foreign exchanges; and other solutions. As December 31, 2020, the company had 44 conventional main branches; 384 conventional sub-branches, cash branches, and functional branches; and 11 Sharia branches and sub-branches. It also operates a network of approximately 1,487 automated teller machines and 70 cash deposit machines. The company was formerly known as Bank Kopra Indonesia and changed its name to PT Bank Danamon Indonesia Tbk in 1976. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Danamon Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of MUFG Bank, Ltd.

INPC.JK.long_name: PT Bank Artha Graha Internasional Tbk
INPC.JK.summary: PT Bank Artha Graha Internasional Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Productive, Consumer, Treasury, and Others. The company offers deposits; and productive, consumer, and other loans. It also provides treasury services; and e-banking services that include mobile banking, retail Internet banking, corporate Internet banking, accounting and billing system, and payroll services, as well as safe deposit boxes. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Inter-Pacific Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank Artha Graha Internasional Tbk in July 2005. PT Bank Artha Graha Internasional Tbk was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

MAYA.JK.summary: PT Bank Mayapada Internasional Tbk provides commercial banking products and services in Indonesia. Its products include savings and current accounts, time deposits, and certificates of deposit. The company also provides auto and home loans; investment and bancassurance products; e-banking services; safe box, payroll, and payment services; and clearing, LLG and RTGS, and foreign exchange transaction services. As of December 31, 2019, it had a network of 39 branches, 91 supporting branches, 83 functional offices, and 3 cash offices, as well as 143 automatic teller machines. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

MCOR.JK.long_name: PT Bank China Construction Bank Indonesia Tbk
MCOR.JK.summary: PT Bank China Construction Bank Indonesia Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Loans, Treasury, Trade Finance, and Unallocated. The company offers various deposit products comprising savings and current accounts, and time deposits; auto and mortgage loans, and commercial express credit products; and safe deposits boxes, and treasury and international banking services. It operates through a network of 21 branch offices, 50 sub-branch offices, and 31 cash offices located in Java, Bali, Sumatra, Kepulauan Riau, West Kalimantan, South Sulawesi, Bangka Belitung, and West Nusa Tenggara. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Windu Kentjana International Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank China Construction Bank Indonesia Tbk in December 2016. PT Bank China Construction Bank Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Bank China Construction Bank Indonesia Tbk operates as a subsidiary of China Construction Bank Corporation.

MEGA.JK.summary: PT Bank Mega Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers saving accounts, current accounts, and time deposits, as well as certificates of deposit; and debit cards. The company also provides corporate, commercial, SME and consumer, cash, housing, working capital, and investment loans; supplier and inventory financing; financing for the purchase of motor vehicles and assets; credit cards; and various credit facilities. In addition, it offers investment products, such as mutual funds and bonds; bancassurance products comprising term life and unit link products; and monitoring agent services for issuance of medium terms notes and guarantor agent services. Further, the company provides funds remittance, funds transfer, intercity clearing, cash management, safe deposit box, custody, trustee, treasury, and trade financing services; international banking services; and electronic banking service, including ATM, internet banking, and mobile banking services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 54 branches, 283 sub-branches, and 40 cash offices. The company was formerly known as PT. Karman bank and changed its name to PT Bank Mega Tbk in 1992. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Mega Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Mega Corpora.

NISP.JK.summary: PT Bank OCBC NISP Tbk provides various banking products and services to corporate and individual customers in Indonesia. It offers savings and current accounts, and deposits; home, multipurpose, automobile, personal, working capital, and investment loans; credit programs; credit and debit cards; mutual funds, insurance products, FX products, bonds, and structured products; and premier and private banking services. The company also provides treasury products; cash management and trade finance services; supplier financing, export, and import services; and Web and mobile banking, and payment services. In addition, it offers bank reference, bank comfort, and confirmation letters; safe deposit boxes; telegraphic transfers; and remittance and e-tax services. The company operates through a network of 236 offices and 592 ATMs. PT Bank OCBC NISP Tbk was formerly known as PT Bank NISP Tbk. The company was incorporated in 1941 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank OCBC NISP Tbk is a subsidiary of OCBC Overseas Investments Pte. Ltd.

NKX.MU.summary: PT Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk provides various banking products and services to small to medium enterprises, individuals, and corporate customers in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Corporate, Business, Retail, Treasury, and Sharia segments. It offers consumer banking products and services, including mortgage, auto, and personal loans, as well as partnership vehicle ownership financing; credit and debit cards; wealth management products; general and life bancassurance products; savings products; digital banking services; saving, current, time, and term deposit products; digital banking products and services; treasury products comprising foreign exchange, strike currency, market linked deposits, swap depos and bonds, and mutual fund products. The company also provides business banking products and services comprising working capital, investment, and financing loans; cash management, trade finance, and other bank services; treasury services that include foreign exchange, money market, derivatives, placements investing, securities transactions, and hedging products; and remittance and value chain services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated a network of 451 branches; 4,316 ATMs; 133 cash deposit machines; and 801 cash recycle machines. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Niaga Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk in May 2008. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk is a subsidiary of CIMB Group Sdn Bhd.

NOBU.JK.summary: PT Bank Nationalnobu Tbk provides banking products and services. The company operates in Corporate and Treasury segments. It offers savings products; and working capital investment loans, consumer, car, housing, apartment, and office loans. The company also provides debit cards, internet banking, mobile banking, and wealth management services; treasury services, such as foreign exchange transactions and hedging, and investment products. It operates through a network of 41 branch offices, 63 cash offices, and 222 ATMs, as well as a 6 sub branch office in Indonesia. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Alfindo. PT Bank Nationalnobu Tbk was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

P7T.F.long_name: PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Timur Tbk
P7T.F.summary: PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Timur Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. The company offers savings and current accounts, and fixed and time deposits; personal and productivity loans; and property construction loans, bank guarantees, checking accounts, investment loans, credit modal Kerja, syndicated loans, financing receivables loans, cash collateral credit, local government loans, and Bureau of Public Service Area loans. It also provides common foreign exchange, hedging forward contract, hedging swap, bank note, deposit on call, and documentation services. In addition, the company offers Sharia savings, deposit, and financing products; merchant relationship program; automated teller machines (ATM), Internet and mobile banking services; SMS banking services; virtual accounts; electronic government staff, debit cards, and prepaid cards; and foreign exchange transaction and remittance services. Further, it provides letters of credit; import tax and letter of credit undocumented affair services; bank guarantee forex services; safe deposit boxes; and money transfer and other banking services. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 41 branches, 7 Sharia branches, 162 conventional sub branches, 10 Sharia sub-branches, 209 cash offices, 247 payment points, 9 Sharia payment points, 195 Sharia service offices, 777 ATMs, 24 Sharia ATMs, 27 automated deposit machines, 92 cash conventional ATM vehicles, and 6 cash Sharia ATM vehicles. PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Timur Tbk was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.

PBCRF.summary: PT Bank Central Asia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services to individual, corporate, and small and medium enterprise customers in Indonesia and internationally. It offers deposits accounts, loans, transaction banking services, electronic banking services, cash management services, credit cards, bancassurance products, mutual fund and treasury investment products, credit facilities, standby LC/bank guarantees, export import facilities, local LC, and foreign exchange facilities. The company also provides investment financing, working capital financing, auto and multipurpose financing, operating lease, other financing activities, money lending and remittance, securities brokerage dealing and securities issuance underwriting, general or loss insurance, life insurance, Sharia banking, and venture capital services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 1,248 offices comprising 139 main branches, 874 sub-branches, and 235 cash offices; and 17,623 automated teller machines. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dwimuria Investama Andalan.

PBCRY.summary: PT Bank Central Asia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services to individual, corporate, and small and medium enterprise customers in Indonesia and internationally. It offers deposits accounts, loans, transaction banking services, electronic banking services, cash management services, credit cards, bancassurance products, mutual fund and treasury investment products, credit facilities, standby LC/bank guarantees, export import facilities, local LC, and foreign exchange facilities. The company also provides investment financing, working capital financing, auto and multipurpose financing, operating lease, other financing activities, money lending and remittance, securities brokerage dealing and securities issuance underwriting, general or loss insurance, life insurance, Sharia banking, and venture capital services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 1,248 offices comprising 139 main branches, 874 sub-branches, and 235 cash offices; and 17,623 automated teller machines. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dwimuria Investama Andalan.

PNBN.JK.summary: P.T. Bank Pan Indonesia Tbk together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Indonesia and internationally. It operates through Banking and Multifinance segments. The company offers savings and current accounts, accounts for investment at capital market, and savings plans and time deposits. It also provides mortgage, car, personal, commercial, corporate, and syndicate loans, as well as multi-purpose credit facility and credit cards. In addition, the company offers forward transaction, foreign exchange, today, tomorrow, spot, and forex swap transaction services; and phone, mobile, and Internet banking, as well as automated teller machine services. Further, it offers custodial services consisting of handling the settlement of securities transaction, safekeeping and administration of securities, and other related services, such as corporate actions, payments of coupon, dividends, bonus payments, payments of securities at maturity date, and others; and mutual funds, bancassurance products, and bonds, as well as risk profiles. Additionally, the company provides bank drafts, safe deposit boxes, and letters of credit with domestic documents; and export and import, bank draft, collection, domestic and fund transfer, cash management, and sharia banking and financing services. It operates 57 main branch offices in Indonesia and 1 representative office in Singapore. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PNBS.JK.long_name: PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk
PNBS.JK.summary: PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk operates as a sharia commercial bank for retail, commercial, and corporate customers in Indonesia. It accepts demand, time, current, savings, and other forms of deposits, as well as certificates of deposit. The company also offers PaS iB profit sharing, working capital, house ownership, investment, multi-service, car ownership, sharia revolving, and other financing products. In addition, it purchases securities based on sharia principles, such as retail Sukuk, government sharia bonds, and corporate Sukuk; and issues reference letters. Further, it provides debit cards, online and mobile banking, billing payment, insurance, safe deposit box, real time gross settlement, bank guarantee, PDSB standing order, and clearing services, as well as cash management systems. It operates through a network of 17 branch offices, and 22 ATMs. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Panin Syariah Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk in July 2016. PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk is a subsidiary of P.T. Bank Pan Indonesia Tbk.

PPERF.summary: PT Bank Mandiri (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services to individuals and businesses in Indonesia, Singapore, Hong Kong, Timor Leste, Shanghai, Malaysia, the United Kingdom, and the Cayman Islands. It offers savings and current accounts, time deposits, demand deposits, and foreign currency savings and current accounts; motorcycle loans and housing loans, as well as loans for various purposes, such as education, home renovation, marriage, health, and other needs for individuals; and working capital loans, investment loans, people's business loans, syndicated loans, and micro business loans for businesses. The company also provides investment products comprising mutual funds and retail state bonds; life, health, and general insurance products; credit, debit, and corporate cards; e-banking services; cash management services; trade finance services, such as financial supply chain management, value chain, import and export, and bank guarantee and standby letters of credit services; custodial services; treasury services, including cash transaction/liquidity and hedging products; trust services comprising trustee, paying agent, security agent, escrow agent, monitoring agent, and receiving bank services; and bankassurance, money transfer, and remittance services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 2,714 office networks and 13,217 ATM networks. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PPERY.summary: PT Bank Mandiri (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services to individuals and businesses in Indonesia, Singapore, Hong Kong, Timor Leste, Shanghai, Malaysia, the United Kingdom, and the Cayman Islands. It offers savings and current accounts, time deposits, demand deposits, and foreign currency savings and current accounts; motorcycle loans and housing loans, as well as loans for various purposes, such as education, home renovation, marriage, health, and other needs for individuals; and working capital loans, investment loans, people's business loans, syndicated loans, and micro business loans for businesses. The company also provides investment products comprising mutual funds and retail state bonds; life, health, and general insurance products; credit, debit, and corporate cards; e-banking services; cash management services; trade finance services, such as financial supply chain management, value chain, import and export, and bank guarantee and standby letters of credit services; custodial services; treasury services, including cash transaction/liquidity and hedging products; trust services comprising trustee, paying agent, security agent, escrow agent, monitoring agent, and receiving bank services; and bankassurance, money transfer, and remittance services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 2,714 office networks and 13,217 ATM networks. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PQ9.F.summary: PT Bank Mandiri (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services to individuals and businesses in Indonesia, Singapore, Hong Kong, Timor Leste, Shanghai, Malaysia, the United Kingdom, and the Cayman Islands. It offers savings and current accounts, time deposits, demand deposits, and foreign currency savings and current accounts; motorcycle loans and housing loans, as well as loans for various purposes, such as education, home renovation, marriage, health, and other needs for individuals; and working capital loans, investment loans, people's business loans, syndicated loans, and micro business loans for businesses. The company also provides investment products comprising mutual funds and retail state bonds; life, health, and general insurance products; credit, debit, and corporate cards; e-banking services; cash management services; trade finance services, such as financial supply chain management, value chain, import and export, and bank guarantee and standby letters of credit services; custodial services; treasury services, including cash transaction/liquidity and hedging products; trust services comprising trustee, paying agent, security agent, escrow agent, monitoring agent, and receiving bank services; and bankassurance, money transfer, and remittance services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 2,714 office networks and 13,217 ATM networks. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PTQ.F.summary: P.T. Bank Pan Indonesia Tbk together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Indonesia and internationally. It operates through Banking and Multifinance segments. The company offers savings and current accounts, accounts for investment at capital market, and savings plans and time deposits. It also provides mortgage, car, personal, commercial, corporate, and syndicate loans, as well as multi-purpose credit facility and credit cards. In addition, the company offers forward transaction, foreign exchange, today, tomorrow, spot, and forex swap transaction services; and phone, mobile, and Internet banking, as well as automated teller machine services. Further, it offers custodial services consisting of handling the settlement of securities transaction, safekeeping and administration of securities, and other related services, such as corporate actions, payments of coupon, dividends, bonus payments, payments of securities at maturity date, and others; and mutual funds, bancassurance products, and bonds, as well as risk profiles. Additionally, the company provides bank drafts, safe deposit boxes, and letters of credit with domestic documents; and export and import, bank draft, collection, domestic and fund transfer, cash management, and sharia banking and financing services. It operates 57 main branch offices in Indonesia and 1 representative office in Singapore. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

SDRA.JK.long_name: PT Bank Woori Saudara Indonesia 1906 Tbk
SDRA.JK.summary: PT Bank Woori Saudara Indonesia 1906 Tbk provides various commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Indonesia. The company provides current and savings accounts, and time and demand deposits; employee, worker, and franchise loans; micro, small, and medium enterprises loans; and corporate and mortgage loans. It also offers remittance collection/clearing, ATM, credit card and telephone bill payment, bancassurance, bank mediation, international and Internet banking, state revenue, and electronic data capture services. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Woori Saudara Indonesia 1906 Tbk is a subsidiary of Woori Bank, Korea.

TA2.SG.summary: PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. The company offers savings and current accounts; demand and time deposits; certificates of deposit; and debit cards. It also provides subsidized and other mortgages; consumer and construction loans; micro and small medium enterprise credits; commercial and institutional funding services; and credit cards. In addition, the company issues debts instruments; buys and sells bills of exchange, promissory notes, commercial papers, treasury bills, government insurance notes, Bank Indonesia certificates, bonds, and other securities instruments; places, borrows, or lends funds from other banks; receives payment from securities bills; acts as a pension fund provider and manager; and conducts Sharia-principle business activities. Further, it offers safekeeping, factoring, trustee, investment banking, treasury, asset management, wealth management, electronic data capture, cash management, branchless banking, bank guarantees, safe deposit box, transfer or remittance, payroll, and other banking services; and electronic banking services, such as automatic teller machine and KiosK, cash deposit machine, internet, virtual account, SMS, and mobile banking services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 103 branches, including 25 Sharia branches; 373 sub-branches comprising 59 Sharia sub-branches; 254 cash offices, including 7 Sharia cash offices; and 3,014 system online payment point/online post offices. The company was formerly known as Bank Tabungan Pos and changed its name to PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk in 1963. PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1897 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
